LolwutBrain

public LolwutBrain()

public void resetGame()
Creates a new game, initializing the penguin, platforms, enemies, items, portals, and score, and setting the game to display the game screen

movePenguinRight

public void movePenguinRight()
Move the penguin right and changes its direction to right

movePenguinLeft

public void movePenguinLeft()
Move the penguin left and changes its direction to left

penguinJump

public boolean penguinJump()
Attempts to make the penguin jump. If the penguin is not on a platform, it cannot jump.

Returns:
true if Penguin jumped, false otherwise

penguinEndJump

public void penguinEndJump()
Ends the penguin's jump in midair, or does nothing if it is already falling

penguinProcess

public void penguinProcess()
Processes one frame's worth of activity for the penguin. Checks if the penguin is on a platform, and causes falling if it is not. Damages the penguin if it is out of bounds. Accelerates the penguin if falling. Checks collisions with items, enemies, and portals.

penguinEnemyJump

public void penguinEnemyJump()
Causing the penguin to bounce off of an enemy that it just killed.

enemyCheck

public void enemyCheck()
Checks what enemies the penguin killed or was damaged by and takes appropriate action for each situation, either removing the enemy from the field or causing damage and knockback to the penguin.

itemCheck

public void itemCheck()
Checks what items the penguin picked up and activates them.

portalCheck

public void portalCheck()
Checks if the penguin intersects with the winning portal, and ends the game if it does, or raises a flag to display a message if the penguin intersects with a wrong portal.

allPhysicalObjects

public java.util.List<PhysicalObject> allPhysicalObjects()
Gets all of the PhysicalObjects in this Lolwut game

Returns:
A List of all PhysicalObjects

advanceFrame

public void advanceFrame()
Advances the game by one frame, by moving all objects according to their velocity and determining what effects happen from collisions.

penguinIsOnPlatform

public boolean penguinIsOnPlatform()
Gets whether the penguin is on a platform.

Returns:
true if the penguin is on a platform, false otherwise

the penguin (player)
